    Calibrate the TargetConfiguration against the supplied audio source parameters (the AcquisitionSettings) and the channel map.
    void
    LikelihoodDetectionParameters.setAcquisitionSettings(AcquisitionSettings settings)
    Sets the acquisition settings were used to create the TargetConfigurations, but does NOT force a error-checking synchronization the way syncWithAcquisitionSettings() does.
